Definition: In this task, you are given a news article. Your task is to classify the article to one out of the four topics 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', 'Sci/Tech'. If the article's main topic is relevant to the world, sports, business, and science/technology, correspondingly, choose the option that is closest to the topic. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].
